getFlashRepaySwapAndCallbackLzArgs(uint1.details: Must be called on the chain where the swap will be executed (a.k.a. destination chain)

params.dstChainId_: Destination chain's LZ id (i.e. chain used for swap)
params.srcChainId_: Source chain's LZ id (i.e. user-facing chain)

getLeverageSwapAndCallbackLzArgs(uint16,.details: Must be called on the chain where the swap will be executed (a.k.a. destination chain)

params.dstChainId_: Destination chain's LZ id (i.e. chain used for swap)
params.srcChainId_: Source chain's LZ id (i.e. user-facing chain)

params.lzArgs_: The LZ args for swap transaction (See: `getFlashRepaySwapAndCallbackLzArgs()`)
params.proxyOFT_: The synthetic token's Proxy OFT contract

params.lzArgs_: The LZ args for swap transaction (See: `getLeverageSwapAndCallbackLzArgs()`)
params.proxyOFT_: The synthetic token's Proxy OFT contract

params.srcChainId_: Source chain's LZ id (i.e. user-facing chain)
Source chain's LZ id (i.e. user-facing chain)

LZ_ADAPTER_PARAMS_VERSION.details: LayerZero adapter param version See more: https://layerzero.gitbook.io/docs/evm-guides/advanced/relayer-adapter-parameters

SG_TYPE_SWAP_REMOTE.details: Stargate swap function type See more: https://stargateprotocol.gitbook.io/stargate/developers/function-types

getFlashRepaySwapAndCallbackLzArgs(uint1.notice: Get LZ args for the swap and callback's trigger execution

getLeverageSwapAndCallbackLzArgs(uint16,.notice: Get LZ args for the swap and callback's trigger execution

quoteCrossChainFlashRepayNativeFee(addre.notice: Get the LZ (native) fee for the `triggerFlashRepay()` call

quoteCrossChainLeverageNativeFee(address.notice: Get the LZ (native) fee for the `triggerLeverageSwap()` call

quoteFlashRepayCallbackNativeFee(uint16).notice: Get the LZ (native) fee for the `crossChainFlashRepayCallback()` call

quoteLeverageCallbackNativeFee(uint16).notice: Get the LZ (native) fee for the `crossChainLeverageCallback()` call
